reviews.text:
Went to The Goat along with our stay at the LC Guest House and had a wonderful experience! 
They deliver to the GH- the service was fast, the food was hot...

TLDR: decent pizza and reasonable pricing. Some of the worst service I've ever received.

I came for coffee and lunch the other day to kill a couple of...
I wasn't expecting much based on reviews, but I thought this was super solid! The brunch menu is super affordable and The Devil on Goatback Scramble was...
